title: images%20(2).jpeg
description:
If there was a wish list for Budgie applets mine would be an app grid menu .

What would yours be ?
comments.comment: TBH, if that's what you want then just go for Gnome proper. They are so close on the back end side of things, and I don't think Budgie is particularly light on resources. The whole point of Budgie, was to make a DE that's simple and palatable to migrators etc, but with a more modern look than say Mate or Cinnamon. Definitely my favourite Ubuntu Flavour/Derivative right now. As pictured, if people want an OSX knock off, there's Elementary....; Simple menu from KDE is nice too. It would fit in very well.
